data.name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Britannia & Germania
data.detailed_description:
This expansion contains two additional maps - Britannia and Germania - that add variety and new challenges to the game. Each map provides its own twist and a unique mechanic.

  • üó∫Ô∏è Britannia is a 23 City map with 10 Provinces. Land and Sea Colonists have separate starting points and you can recruit new Colonists in every City with your House in it.
  • üó∫Ô∏è Germania is a large 30 City map with 12 provinces and a number of additional rules. It introduces Roman castles grant additional bonuses via the Tribune and Sea colonists traverse the rivers - and more than one can occupy the same one.

Play on the biggest map in Concordia today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707535/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Britannia__Germania/
data.about_the_game:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707535/Concordia_Digital_Edition__Britannia__Germania/
data.short_description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Britannia and Germania with their unique mechanics - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Italian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

Recommended:
